parameters.name: radialDistance
parameters.description: Radial distance of MESSENGER from the Sun

parameters.name: latitude_ecliptic
parameters.description: ----> North latitude from the ecliptic plane

parameters.name: azimuth_ecliptic
parameters.description: ----> Azimuthal angle from Earth-Sun line in ecliptic plane, positive in the direction of Earth's motion

parameters.name: radialDistance_200
parameters.description: Radial distance of MESSENGER from the Sun (0.5 sec cadence)

parameters.name: latitude_ecliptic_200
parameters.description: ----> North latitude from the ecliptic plane (0.5 sec cadence)

parameters.name: azimuth_ecliptic_200
parameters.description: ----> Azimuthal angle from Earth-Sun line in ecliptic plane, positive in the direction of Earth's motion (0.5 sec cadence)

parameters.name: B_radial_q
parameters.description: (Good values only) B radial (Br) in RTN coordinates

parameters.name: B_radial_200
parameters.description: (Good values at 0.5 sec cadence only) B radial (Br) in RTN coordinates

parameters.name: B_tangential_200
parameters.description: ----> (Good values at 0.5 sec cadence only) B tangential (Bt)

parameters.name: B_normal_200
parameters.description: ----> (Good values at 0.5 sec cadence only) B normal (Bn)

parameters.name: B_radial
parameters.description: (All qualities) B radial (Br) in RTN coordinates

parameters.name: Quality_Flag
parameters.description: 3-digit daily quality flag (222 or 223 = good = boom deployed, sensor in shadow, any heater contamination corrected)
